'''Claire (Charlie) Hardwick''' (born about [[1959]] [[Wallsend]], [[Tyne and Wear]]<ref name="chronicle">[http://www.emmerdale.org/emmerdale/profiles6/val/charliehardwick.htm], ''[[Evening Chronicle]]'', [[10 February]] [[2004]].</ref>) is an [[England|English]] [[actress]] well known for her part in [[ITV]]'s ''[[Emmerdale]]'' as [[Val Lambert]]. Charlie has a sister Called Elaine McMahon and a brother named Ronnie Hardwick (in real life).
'''Claire (Charlie) Hardwick''' (born about [[1959]] [[Wallsend]], [[Tyne and Wear]]<ref name="chronicle">[http://www.emmerdale.org/emmerdale/profiles6/val/charliehardwick.htm], ''[[Evening Chronicle]]'', [[10 February]] [[2004]].</ref>) is an [[England|English]] [[actress]] well known for her part in [[ITV]]'s ''[[Emmerdale]]'' as [[Val Lambert]]. Charlie has a sister Called Elaine McMahon and a brother named Ronnie Hardwick (in real life).
